remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很有用，當您想要判斷其值或狀態而定的資料格的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中的處理常式中，錯誤圖像顯示在儲存格中除非屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像 （glyph） 時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用並屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用儲存格的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何建立儲存格的錯誤訊息，而不會取消共用資料列，或造成被複製到所有共用的儲存格的資料格錯誤。In the following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells.
